title: Review Application for Potential Fraud
description: An underwriter's automated system flags a new life insurance application for potential fraud.

tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter sees the system flagged a mismatch between the stated income and third-party data sources.

tasks.description: Request additional financial documentation from the applicant to verify their income.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter sends a request back to the agent for the applicant's tax returns.

tasks.description: Place the application on hold pending receipt and review of the documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter updates the application status to 'Pending-Additional Information'.
